languages.text: [Обратиться к бойцам на арене] "Смерть на потеху ксеносам — вечное проклятье и позор на души, овеянные славой Императора! Соединим клинки — уничтожим тех, кто пытался убить вас!"

[Address the fighters in the arena] "Dying to entertain xenos is a path to eternal shame and condemnation of souls touched by the Emperor's undying glory! Let us join our blades — we will destroy those who sought to kill you!"
languages.original_text: [Обратиться к бойцам на арене] "Смерть на потеху ксеносам — вечное проклятье и позор на души, овеянные славой Императора! Соединим клинки — уничтожим тех, кто пытался убить вас!"

traits.locale_text: [Address the fighters in the arena] "Dying to please the aliens is shameful and will condemn your souls touched by the Emperor's undying glory! Let us join our blades — and destroy those who sought to kill you!"

[Address the fighters in the arena] "Dying to please the aliens is shameful and will condemn your souls touched by the Emperor's undying glory! Let us join our blades — and destroy those who sought to kill you!"

[Address the fighters in the arena] "Dying to entertain the xenos is a path to eternal shame and condemnation of your souls, ones touched by the Emperor's undying glory! Let us join our blades — we will destroy those who sought to kill you!"

[Address the fighters in the arena] "Dying to entertain the xenos is a path to eternal shame and condemnation of your souls, ones touched by the Emperor's undying glory! Let us join our blades — we will destroy those who sought to kill you!"

[Address the fighters in the arena] "Dying to entertain xenos is a path to eternal shame and condemnation of souls touched by the Emperor's undying glory! Let us join our blades — we will destroy those who sought to kill you!"

[Address the fighters in the arena] "Dying to entertain xenos is a path to eternal shame and condemnation of souls touched by the Emperor's undying glory! Let us join our blades — we will destroy those who sought to kill you!"

languages.text: [闘技場の戦士に語りかける]「異種族を喜ばせて死ぬなんて、皇帝の不滅なる栄光に触れた魂が、これから永遠に責められ恥をかく！剣をその手に取れ…我々の命を狙う者達を倒すんだ！」
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters in the arena] "Dying to entertain xenos is a path to eternal shame and condemnation of souls touched by the Emperor's undying glory! Let us join our blades — we will destroy those who sought to kill you!"

traits.locale_text: [闘技場の戦士に語りかける]「異種族を喜ばせて死ぬなんて、皇帝の不滅なる栄光に触れた魂が、これから永遠に責められ恥をかく！剣をその手に取れ…我々の命を狙う者達を倒すんだ！」

languages.text: [对竞技场里的战士开口]“如果你们为了取悦异形而死，你们的灵魂将会永远陷入耻辱与诅咒之中，再也无法得到帝皇不朽的荣耀！我们联手战斗吧！杀光那些打算杀害我们的人！”
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters in the arena] "Dying to entertain xenos is a path to eternal shame and condemnation of souls touched by the Emperor's undying glory! Let us join our blades — we will destroy those who sought to kill you!"

traits.locale_text: [对竞技场里的战士开口]“如果你们为了取悦异形而死，你们的灵魂将会永远陷入耻辱与诅咒之中，再也无法得到帝皇不朽的荣耀！我们联手战斗吧！杀光那些打算杀害我们的人！”

languages.text: [Vous adresser aux combattants dans l'arène] « Mourir pour divertir des xénos est une infamie et mènera votre âme, touchée par la gloire de l'Empereur, sur la voie de la damnation éternelle ! Joignez-vous à moi, et ensemble, nous détruirons ceux qui cherchent à vous tuer ! »
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters in the arena] "Dying to entertain xenos is a path to eternal shame and condemnation of souls touched by the Emperor's undying glory! Let us join our blades — we will destroy those who sought to kill you!"

traits.locale_text: [Vous adresser aux combattants dans l'arène] « Mourir pour divertir des xénos est une infamie et mènera votre âme, touchée par la gloire de l'Empereur, sur la voie de la damnation éternelle ! Joignez-vous à moi, et ensemble, nous détruirons ceux qui cherchent à vous tuer ! »

languages.text: [Dirigirte a los guerreros de la arena] «Morir para entretener a los xenos es el camino de la vergüenza eterna, ¡una condena para las almas tocadas por la gloria inmortal del Emperador! Unamos nuestras armas, ¡destruyamos a quienes buscaban mataros!».
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters in the arena] "Dying to entertain xenos is a path to eternal shame and condemnation of souls touched by the Emperor's undying glory! Let us join our blades — we will destroy those who sought to kill you!"

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte a los guerreros de la arena] «Morir para entretener a los xenos es el camino de la vergüenza eterna, ¡una condena para las almas tocadas por la gloria inmortal del Emperador! Unamos nuestras armas, ¡destruyamos a quienes buscaban mataros!».

languages.text: [Die Kämpfer in der Arena ansprechen] "Sterben, um Xenos zu unterhalten, ist ein Pfad, der zu ewiger Schande führt — und zur Verdammnis von Seelen, die vom unsterblichen Glanz des Imperators berührt wurden! Schließen wir unsere Klingen zusammen — wir vernichten jene, die Euch töten wollten!"
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters in the arena] "Dying to entertain xenos is a path to eternal shame and condemnation of souls touched by the Emperor's undying glory! Let us join our blades — we will destroy those who sought to kill you!"

traits.locale_text: [Die Kämpfer in der Arena ansprechen] "Sterben, um Xenos zu unterhalten, ist ein Pfad, der zu ewiger Schande führt — und zur Verdammnis von Seelen, die vom unsterblichen Glanz des Imperators berührt wurden! Schließen wir unsere Klingen zusammen — wir vernichten jene, die Euch töten wollten!"

languages.text: [Arenadaki dövüşçülere hitap et] "Zenoları eğlendirmek için ölmek, ebedî utanca ve İmparator'un ölümsüz ihtişamıyla kutsadığı ruhların lanetlenmesiyle sonuçlanır! Gelin, omuz omuza dövüşelim! Canınıza göz koyanları kılıçtan geçirelim!"
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters in the arena] "Dying to entertain xenos is a path to eternal shame and condemnation of souls touched by the Emperor's undying glory! Let us join our blades — we will destroy those who sought to kill you!"

traits.locale_text: [Arenadaki dövüşçülere hitap et] "Zenoları eğlendirmek için ölmek, ebedî utanca ve İmparator'un ölümsüz ihtişamıyla kutsadığı ruhların lanetlenmesiyle sonuçlanır! Gelin, omuz omuza dövüşelim! Canınıza göz koyanları kılıçtan geçirelim!"
